about_the_game:
Starbase Soundtrack Vol. 1 features 14 original songs by the fantastic Marcus Warner, full of music that fits all aspects of Starbase. Moody atmospheres, bold and epic orchestral tracks and aggressive beats will inspire you to explore, build impressive creations and win dangerous battles.

In addition, Starbase Soundtrack Vol. 1 contains the tracks for the "Announcement Trailer" and the "New Features Trailer (January 2020)", two instrumental versions, and five ambient mood pieces by Sauli Lehtinen, which utilize the semi-procedural ambient system created for Starbase. The total time comes in at a whopping 2 hours 28 minutes and all tracks have been fully mastered for soundtrack distribution.

To download the FLAC versions in addition to MP3s, please enable "Download high-quality audio files" in the Steam Client (Settings -> Music -> Additional Files).

The total time comes in at a whopping 2 hours 28 minutes and all tracks have been fully mastered for soundtrack distribution.

To download the FLAC versions in addition to MP3s, please enable "Download high-quality audio files" in the Steam Client (Settings -> Music -> Additional Files).

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Storage: 268 MB available space
  • Storage (high-quality audio): Additional 1 GB available space
